member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.GetAGMConnectionCmdlet
member.summary: Get information about the connection with the provided id.

summary.para: The service has not provided documentation for this parameter; please refer to the service's API reference documentation for the latest available information.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.GetAGMConnectionCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is '*'. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.ApiGatewayManagementApi.Model.GetConnectionResponse). Specifying the name of a property of type Amazon.ApiGatewayManagementApi.Model.GetConnectionResponse will result in that property being returned. Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.GetAGMConnectionCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the ConnectionId parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^ConnectionId' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.RemoveAGMConnectionCmdlet
member.summary: Delete the connection with the provided id.

summary.para: The service has not provided documentation for this parameter; please refer to the service's API reference documentation for the latest available information.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.RemoveAGMConnectionCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The cmdlet doesn't have a return value by default. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.ApiGatewayManagementApi.Model.DeleteConnectionResponse). Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.RemoveAGMConnectionCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the ConnectionId parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^ConnectionId' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.RemoveAGMConnectionCmdlet.Force
member.summary: This parameter overrides confirmation prompts to force the cmdlet to continue its operation. This parameter should always be used with caution.

member.name: T:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.SendAGMDataToConnectionCmdlet
member.summary: Sends the provided data to the specified connection.

para.para: The identifier of the connection that a specific client is using.
The data to be sent to the client specified by its connection id.

summary.para: The cmdlet will automatically convert the supplied parameter of type string, string[], System.IO.FileInfo or System.IO.Stream to byte[] before supplying it to the service.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.SendAGMDataToConnectionCmdlet.Select
member.summary: Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The cmdlet doesn't have a return value by default. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.ApiGatewayManagementApi.Model.PostToConnectionResponse). Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.SendAGMDataToConnectionCmdlet.PassThru
member.summary: Changes the cmdlet behavior to return the value passed to the Data parameter. The -PassThru parameter is deprecated, use -Select '^Data' instead. This parameter will be removed in a future version.

member.name: P:Amazon.PowerShell.Cmdlets.AGM.SendAGMDataToConnectionCmdlet.Force
member.summary: This parameter overrides confirmation prompts to force the cmdlet to continue its operation. This parameter should always be used with caution.
